leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 材料-实验合成与表征自动化生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 采集→计划→执行→记录→复现/审计
leaf_cluster.tool_form: LIMS/设备接口 + 闭环平台

queries: [WEB] materials science data provenance tools github
[WEB] experiment tracking software for labs github
[WEB] lab data audit trail open source github

tools.name: Python-IMU-Data-Sampling-App
tools.one_line_profile: Data acquisition tool for IMU motion tracking sensors
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to sample and log data from Inertial Measurement Units (IMU), facilitating motion tracking data collection for biomechanics, robotics, or physical experimentation.

tools.name: FedHeteroBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark framework for federated learning on heterogeneous data
tools.detailed_description: A repository of frameworks and benchmarks for handling data heterogeneity in federated learning (Non-IID settings), providing unified implementations for reproducible AI research experiments.

tools.name: EmotionCircuits-LLM
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for discovering emotion circuits in Large Language Models
tools.detailed_description: A complete, reproducible framework for analyzing, discovering, and controlling emotion circuits within Large Language Models, contributing to AI interpretability and cognitive modeling.

tools.name: chatBIS
tools.one_line_profile: Conversational AI assistant for openBIS research data management
tools.detailed_description: A RAG-based conversational AI assistant designed to help researchers interact with the openBIS research data management system, providing natural language querying for documentation and system usage.

tools.name: aiida-gromacs
tools.one_line_profile: GROMACS plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine
tools.detailed_description: A plugin enabling the use of GROMACS molecular dynamics software within the AiiDA workflow management system, facilitating reproducible computational chemistry simulations.

tools.name: GaTector
tools.one_line_profile: Unified framework for gaze object prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for gaze object prediction, integrating object detection and gaze estimation to identify objects being looked at, applicable in behavioral research and HCI.

tools.name: Chemotion ELN
tools.one_line_profile: Open source Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN) for chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A web-based Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN) designed for chemists to manage reactions, samples, and analytical data, supporting digitization and provenance in chemical research.

tools.name: DeepDIVA
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for reproducible Deep Learning experiments in Document Image Analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework designed to facilitate reproducible deep learning experiments, specifically tailored for Document Image Analysis (DIA) tasks.

tools.name: gitlab2prov
tools.one_line_profile: Extract W3C PROV provenance from GitLab projects
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool that extracts provenance information conforming to the W3C PROV standard from GitLab project history, enabling tracking of software and data evolution in scientific projects.

tools.name: prov2neo
tools.one_line_profile: Import W3C PROV documents into Neo4j
tools.detailed_description: A utility to import W3C PROV provenance documents into a Neo4j graph database, facilitating the visualization and querying of scientific lineage and audit trails.

tools.name: DDRL4NAV
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Reinforcement Learning framework for navigation
tools.detailed_description: A reproducible Deep Reinforcement Learning training framework for robotic navigation tasks, separating forward, backward, and environment modules for research experimentation.

tools.name: DagsHub Client
tools.one_line_profile: Python client for DagsHub data science collaboration platform
tools.detailed_description: Client libraries for DagsHub, enabling data scientists to version control data, models, and experiments, and integrate with the DagsHub platform for scientific collaboration.

tools.name: Fast Data Science (fds)
tools.one_line_profile: CLI for version controlling data and code in data science
tools.detailed_description: A command-line interface that wraps git and DVC (Data Version Control) to streamline the versioning of code and large datasets for data scientists, ensuring reproducibility.

tools.name: Komadu
tools.one_line_profile: Provenance collection and visualization tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for capturing, storing, and visualizing data lineage and provenance information based on the W3C PROV standard, supporting scientific workflow auditing.

tools.name: Jovian Archive
tools.one_line_profile: Automated metagenomics and viromics analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline focusing on automation and audit trails for metagenomics and viromics analysis, designed to be user-friendly for wet-lab biologists.

tools.name: Taint-Evaluator
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation suite for binary taint tracking tools
tools.detailed_description: A suite of experiments and benchmarks for evaluating the performance and accuracy of open-source binary taint trackers, supporting systems security research.

tools.name: MoSQITo
tools.one_line_profile: Modular framework for sound quality metrics
tools.detailed_description: A unified and modular development framework for calculating key sound quality metrics, favoring reproducible science in psychoacoustics and signal processing.

tools.name: FastTrackML
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance experiment tracking server
tools.detailed_description: An experiment tracking server compatible with MLflow, focused on speed and scalability for managing large-scale machine learning experiments and ensuring reproducibility.

tools.name: dataverse-uploader
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to upload directory trees to Dataverse repositories
tools.detailed_description: A utility for uploading local folder structures and datasets to Dataverse or Clowder repositories, facilitating the archiving and sharing of research data.

tools.name: Rxiv-Maker
tools.one_line_profile: Automated scientific preprint generation tool focusing on reproducibility
tools.detailed_description: A GitHub-native framework that converts markdown into publication-ready PDFs, automating the generation of scientific preprints with built-in support for version control and reproducibility.

tools.name: CMF
tools.one_line_profile: Metadata and lineage tracking framework for ML pipelines
tools.detailed_description: Common Metadata Framework (CMF) helps collect, store, and query metadata associated with machine learning pipelines. It tracks the lineage of artifacts and executions in distributed AI pipelines using a content-hash based versioning system.

tools.name: Git2PROV
tools.one_line_profile: Converter from Git history to W3C PROV provenance model
tools.detailed_description: A tool that analyzes Git repositories and converts their commit history into the W3C PROV standard format, enabling standardized provenance tracking for software and data versioning.

tools.name: pycellin
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based framework for analyzing cell lineages
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed to manipulate and analyze cell lineages derived from cell tracking data using a graph-based approach, facilitating the study of cellular dynamics and genealogy.

tools.name: Computer-Generated-Hologram
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation framework for computer-generated holography
tools.detailed_description: A library and simulation framework for calculating, recording, and reproducing computer-generated holograms using MATLAB and Python, supporting the study of digital holography processes.

tools.name: aiida-fleur
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the FLEUR DFT code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with the FLEUR high-performance density functional theory (DFT) code, enabling high-throughput electronic structure calculations and provenance tracking.

tools.name: aiida-jutools
tools.one_line_profile: Utility tools for AiiDA materials science workflows
tools.detailed_description: A collection of helper tools and utilities designed to simplify the daily usage of the AiiDA workflow engine for materials science research, enhancing productivity and workflow management.

tools.name: aiida-kkr
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the JuKKR DFT code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with the JuKKR (Korringa-Kohn-Rostoker) code, facilitating high-throughput electronic structure calculations and automated provenance tracking for KKR methods.

tools.name: Kosh
tools.one_line_profile: Data management and query API for scientific codes
tools.detailed_description: Kosh provides a Python API for scientific codes to store, query, and share data. It sits on top of Sina and supports various database backends, aiming to simplify data access and sharing in scientific computing environments.

tools.name: Crate-O
tools.one_line_profile: Browser-based editor for Research Object Crates (RO-Crate)
tools.detailed_description: A web-based tool for creating and editing Research Object Crates (RO-Crate), a community standard for packaging research data with structured metadata to ensure FAIR principles and reproducibility.

tools.name: Spyglass
tools.one_line_profile: Neuroscience data analysis framework for reproducible research
tools.detailed_description: A data analysis framework built for neuroscience research, emphasizing reproducibility and data sharing. It provides tools for managing and analyzing complex neurophysiological data.

tools.name: Trixi
tools.one_line_profile: Modular experiment logger and reproducibility tool for PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: An experiment infrastructure tool optimized for PyTorch that helps manage, log, and visualize machine learning experiments, fostering reproducibility and structured experimentation.

tools.name: Proteomics Lab Agent
tools.one_line_profile: AI agent framework for automating proteomics lab documentation and guidance
tools.detailed_description: A multimodal, agentic AI framework designed to capture and share practical expertise in proteomics laboratories. It uses video analysis to automate documentation and provide personalized guidance, enhancing reproducibility in wet lab environments.

tools.name: SimpleWorkflows.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight workflow engine for Julia scientific computing
tools.detailed_description: A simple workflow engine written in Julia, designed to manage and execute scientific computing tasks and pipelines.

tools.name: ModelChimp
tools.one_line_profile: Experiment tracking platform for machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A platform for tracking machine learning and deep learning experiments, allowing researchers to monitor model performance, parameters, and code versions to ensure reproducibility.

tools.name: ATNA API
tools.one_line_profile: API for IHE Audit Trail and Node Authentication (ATNA) compliance
tools.detailed_description: A utility library for creating IHE Audit Trail and Node Authentication (ATNA) audit messages, facilitating compliance with healthcare data auditing standards (ITI-20).

tools.name: Framework Reproducibility
tools.one_line_profile: Tools and guidelines for deterministic deep learning training
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools and best practices provided by NVIDIA to ensure reproducibility in deep learning frameworks, addressing non-deterministic behavior in GPU-accelerated operations.

tools.name: Flowcept
tools.one_line_profile: Runtime provenance system for AI and scientific workflows
tools.detailed_description: A system for capturing, enriching, and querying runtime provenance data for AI and scientific workflows across edge, cloud, and HPC environments, enabling deep observability and auditability.

tools.name: BioSimSpace
tools.one_line_profile: Interoperable Python framework for biomolecular simulation
tools.detailed_description: An interoperable framework for biomolecular simulation that abstracts away the differences between various simulation packages, facilitating reproducible and portable simulation workflows.

tools.name: mousetrap-os
tools.one_line_profile: Mouse-tracking plugin for OpenSesame experiments
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the OpenSesame experiment builder that enables the tracking of mouse movements (process tracing) during psychological and behavioral experiments.

tools.name: ro-crate-py
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for creating and consuming RO-Crates
tools.detailed_description: A Python library to create, modify, and consume Research Object Crates (RO-Crate), a community standard for packaging research data with metadata to ensure reproducibility and provenance.

tools.name: ro-crate-validator-py
tools.one_line_profile: Validator for Research Object Crates
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool to validate Research Object Crates (RO-Crate) against the specification, ensuring compliance and correctness of scientific data packages.

tools.name: runcrate
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow runner for RO-Crates
tools.detailed_description: A tool to execute computational workflows defined within Research Object Crates (RO-Crate), facilitating the reproduction of scientific analyses.

tools.name: QA-Board
tools.one_line_profile: Experiment tracker for algorithm R&D
tools.detailed_description: An experiment tracking and visualization tool designed for R&D in algorithms and performance tuning, allowing researchers to organize, compare, and share simulation or analysis runs.

tools.name: SciCat Frontend
tools.one_line_profile: Web interface for SciCat Data Catalogue
tools.detailed_description: The official frontend for the SciCat Data Catalogue, a system used by large-scale scientific facilities (like neutron sources and synchrotrons) to manage, ingest, and retrieve scientific datasets and metadata.

tools.name: Renku
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for reproducible and collaborative data analysis
tools.detailed_description: Renku is a platform that enables reproducible data science by tracking the lineage of data and code, managing workflows, and providing a collaborative environment for scientific analysis.

tools.name: renku-jupyterlab-ts
tools.one_line_profile: Renku extension for JupyterLab
tools.detailed_description: A JupyterLab extension that integrates Renku's reproducibility and lineage tracking features directly into the Jupyter interface, allowing scientists to capture provenance during interactive analysis.

tools.name: renku-python
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for Renku platform
tools.detailed_description: The Python SDK for Renku, allowing programmatic access to Renku's features for dataset management, lineage tracking, and workflow execution.

tools.name: renku-ui
tools.one_line_profile: Web frontend for Renku platform
tools.detailed_description: The web-based user interface for the Renku platform, enabling users to explore projects, datasets, and lineage graphs, and to manage collaborative scientific workflows.

tools.name: aiida-champ
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for CHAMP quantum chemistry code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with the CHAMP (Cornell-Holland Ab-initio Materials Package) code, enabling automated and reproducible quantum chemistry simulations.

tools.name: aiida-qp2
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Quantum Package 2.0
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine to interface with Quantum Package 2.0, facilitating the automation and provenance tracking of quantum chemistry calculations.

tools.name: TrackLab
tools.one_line_profile: Modular end-to-end tracking framework
tools.detailed_description: A modular framework for computer vision-based object tracking, designed for research and development purposes, enabling the analysis of movement and trajectories (e.g., in behavioral science or biology).

tools.name: Phenomanager
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for managing phenotype data
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed by UFF eScience for managing and organizing phenotype data, likely for biological or agricultural research.

tools.name: ReproServer
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based platform for reproducing ReproZip-packed experiments
tools.detailed_description: A web application that allows users to upload and reproduce experiments packaged with ReproZip in a cloud environment, facilitating the verification and exploration of computational results without local setup.

tools.name: ReproZip
tools.one_line_profile: Computational reproducibility tool for packing experiments
tools.detailed_description: A tool that simplifies the process of creating reproducible experiments by tracking operating system calls to identify and package all necessary dependencies, data, and configuration files into a self-contained bundle.

tools.name: VersionClimber
tools.one_line_profile: Automated package dependency evolution system for data science
tools.detailed_description: A system designed to help data scientists navigate dependency hell by automating the search for compatible package versions to upgrade or downgrade data science scripts and workflows.

tools.name: VevestaX
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight experiment tracking library for Machine Learning
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that enables tracking of machine learning experiments, including features, hyperparameters, and performance metrics, with automatic logging to spreadsheets or GitHub.

tools.name: VisTrails
tools.one_line_profile: Scientific workflow and provenance management system
tools.detailed_description: An open-source scientific workflow management system that provides comprehensive provenance infrastructure, maintaining detailed history of steps followed and data derived during exploratory computational tasks.

tools.name: SoptSC
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell data analysis tool for clustering and lineage inference
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based tool for analyzing single-cell RNA-seq data, offering unsupervised inference of clustering, cell lineage, pseudotime, and cell-cell communication networks.

tools.name: LineagePulse
tools.one_line_profile: Differential expression analysis for single-cell RNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: An R package for performing differential expression analysis on single-cell RNA-seq data, specifically designed to handle the noise and dropout characteristics of such data.

tools.name: ACTS
tools.one_line_profile: Particle track reconstruction toolkit for high energy physics
tools.detailed_description: A framework-independent toolkit for charged particle track reconstruction in high energy physics experiments, providing modern C++ implementations of tracking algorithms.

tools.name: aiida-cusp
tools.one_line_profile: Custodian-based VASP plugin for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with VASP, utilizing Custodian for robust error handling and job management during material science simulations.

tools.name: aiida-phonopy
tools.one_line_profile: Phonon calculation plugin for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for AiiDA that interfaces with Phonopy to automate the calculation of phonon properties (vibrational spectra) in materials.

tools.name: aiida-trains-pot
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning workflow for neural network potentials in AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA workflow that implements a fully automated active learning scheme to train neural network interatomic potentials for material simulations.

tools.name: aiida-vasp
tools.one_line_profile: VASP plugin for AiiDA workflow engine
tools.detailed_description: The official plugin connecting the AiiDA provenance and workflow engine with the VASP code for first-principles atomistic simulations.

tools.name: AiiDAlab
tools.one_line_profile: Core library for the AiiDAlab web platform
tools.detailed_description: The core implementation of AiiDAlab, a web-based platform that makes high-throughput computational materials science accessible via a user-friendly interface.

tools.name: aiidalab-qe
tools.one_line_profile: Quantum ESPRESSO application for AiiDAlab
tools.detailed_description: A web-based application running on AiiDAlab that provides a graphical interface for running and analyzing Quantum ESPRESSO calculations.

tools.name: aiida-ase
tools.one_line_profile: ASE plugin for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A plugin that integrates the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) with AiiDA, allowing ASE calculators and structures to be used within AiiDA's provenance tracking system.

tools.name: aiida-lammps
tools.one_line_profile: LAMMPS plugin for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for AiiDA to interface with the LAMMPS molecular dynamics code, enabling automated and reproducible MD simulations.

tools.name: aiida-common-workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Standardized workflow interfaces for materials codes in AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing common interfaces for workflows across different quantum engines (like VASP, QE, CP2K) in AiiDA, facilitating cross-code verification and interoperability.

tools.name: AiiDA Core
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Interactive Infrastructure and Database for Computational Science
tools.detailed_description: The core engine of AiiDA, providing a flexible and scalable infrastructure for automated workflow execution and comprehensive data provenance tracking in computational science.

tools.name: aiida-cp2k
tools.one_line_profile: CP2K plugin for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A plugin connecting AiiDA with the CP2K quantum chemistry and solid state physics software package.

tools.name: aiida-hubbard
tools.one_line_profile: Hubbard parameter calculation workflows for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A package for calculating self-consistent onsite and intersite Hubbard U and V parameters from first-principles using linear response theory within AiiDA.

tools.name: aiida-hyperqueue
tools.one_line_profile: HyperQueue scheduler plugin for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A plugin enabling AiiDA to submit and manage jobs using the HyperQueue metascheduler, optimizing high-throughput task execution on HPC clusters.

tools.name: aiida-project
tools.one_line_profile: Project management utility for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool and library for managing AiiDA projects, facilitating the organization and switching between different research contexts.

tools.name: aiida-quantumespresso
tools.one_line_profile: Quantum ESPRESSO plugin for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: The official AiiDA plugin for the Quantum ESPRESSO suite, enabling automated, reproducible electronic-structure calculations and provenance tracking.

tools.name: aiida-shell
tools.one_line_profile: Shell command wrapper for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A plugin that allows running arbitrary shell commands within the AiiDA framework, automatically capturing provenance and data lineage for ad-hoc processing steps.

tools.name: aiida-submission-controller
tools.one_line_profile: High-throughput submission manager for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A utility library for managing large batches of AiiDA process submissions, providing flow control and rate limiting for high-throughput studies.

tools.name: aiida-wannier90
tools.one_line_profile: Wannier90 plugin for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A plugin connecting AiiDA with the Wannier90 code for computing maximally-localized Wannier functions.

tools.name: aiida-wannier90-workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Wannier90 workflows for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A collection of advanced, automated workflows for computing Wannier functions using AiiDA and Wannier90, streamlining complex multi-step calculation procedures.

tools.name: aiida-workgraph
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive workflow designer and manager for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A tool for designing and managing flexible AiiDA workflows with an interactive GUI, supporting checkpoints, provenance tracking, and remote execution.

tools.name: Plumpy
tools.one_line_profile: A workflow library for managing processes and provenance in computational science
tools.detailed_description: Plumpy is a Python workflow library that serves as the underlying engine for AiiDA. It enables the creation of state-persistent processes with defined inputs and outputs, facilitating the automation of complex scientific workflows and the tracking of data provenance.

tools.name: Aim
tools.one_line_profile: An open-source experiment tracking tool for machine learning
tools.detailed_description: Aim is a supercharged experiment tracker that logs AI/ML training runs, enabling comparison of hyperparameters, metrics, and images. It provides a UI for visualizing experiment results and ensuring reproducibility in scientific machine learning workflows.

tools.name: Mandala
tools.one_line_profile: A Python framework for experiment tracking and incremental computing
tools.detailed_description: Mandala is an experiment tracking framework that integrates persistence logic directly into Python code. It allows researchers to automatically save and query results of function calls, facilitating complex data analysis pipelines and ensuring reproducibility without boilerplate code.

tools.name: SpecLab
tools.one_line_profile: Testing and compliance framework for medical devices
tools.detailed_description: SpecLab is a C++23 testing framework designed for medical devices. It supports BDD testing and built-in compliance for standards like IEC 62304 and ISO 13485, providing structured test execution and audit trails necessary for regulated scientific/medical environments.

tools.name: Apache Hamilton
tools.one_line_profile: A micro-framework for defining dataflows with lineage and metadata
tools.detailed_description: Apache Hamilton helps data scientists define testable, modular dataflows that automatically encode lineage and metadata. It is used to manage complex data transformation pipelines in scientific computing and machine learning, ensuring traceability and reproducibility.

tools.name: AD-ML
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for reproducible Alzheimer's disease classification
tools.detailed_description: AD-ML is a framework designed for the reproducible classification of Alzheimer's disease using machine learning on neuroimaging data. It provides standardized pipelines to ensure consistent results in medical image analysis.

tools.name: ClinicaDL
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for reproducible neuroimaging processing
tools.detailed_description: ClinicaDL is a framework for the reproducible processing of neuroimaging data using deep learning methods. It automates the pipeline from raw data to training and evaluation, focusing on reproducibility in clinical neuroscience research.

tools.name: Ogama
tools.one_line_profile: Software for recording and analyzing eye- and mouse-tracking experiments
tools.detailed_description: Ogama (Open Gaze And Mouse Analyzer) is an application for recording and analyzing eye- and mouse-tracking data from slideshow-based experiments. It is used in psychology and neuroscience research to study attention and visual processing.

tools.name: ML Lineage Helper
tools.one_line_profile: Helper library for AWS SageMaker ML Lineage Tracking
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper around SageMaker ML Lineage Tracking that extends lineage capabilities to end-to-end ML lifecycles. It helps researchers and data scientists track artifacts, feature store groups, and queries, ensuring provenance in machine learning workflows.

tools.name: SageMaker Experiments
tools.one_line_profile: SDK for tracking machine learning experiments on SageMaker
tools.detailed_description: A library for tracking experiments and logging metrics for Amazon SageMaker model training. It allows scientists to organize, track, and compare machine learning experiments, facilitating reproducibility and analysis of model performance.

tools.name: aiida-vibroscopy
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for automated vibrational spectroscopy
tools.detailed_description: A Python package built on AiiDA for automating the calculation of infrared and Raman spectra and phonons. It provides workflows to manage the complex simulation steps required for vibrational spectroscopy in materials science.

tools.name: K4A.Net
tools.one_line_profile: .NET library for Azure Kinect sensor data acquisition
tools.detailed_description: A library to work with Azure Kinect devices, providing APIs for sensor data recording, playback, and body tracking. It is used in research labs for acquiring depth and motion data for computer vision and biomechanics experiments.

tools.name: Calkit
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for reproducible research project management
tools.detailed_description: Calkit simplifies version control, environment management, and pipeline execution for research projects. It aims to make research reproducible by providing a single-button interface for running and tracking project workflows.

tools.name: Imbalanced Streams
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for experimental analysis of imbalanced data streams
tools.detailed_description: A Java framework for conducting reproducible experiments on learning from imbalanced data streams. It provides implementations of various algorithms and evaluation metrics to facilitate research in data stream mining.

tools.name: Clowder
tools.one_line_profile: Research data management and analysis platform
tools.detailed_description: Clowder is a data management system designed to support research by allowing users to share, annotate, organize, and analyze large collections of datasets. It features an extensible metadata system and an event bus for automatic data curation and analysis.

tools.name: Clowder v2
tools.one_line_profile: Next-generation research data management platform
tools.detailed_description: The second version of the Clowder research data management system, currently in development, aiming to provide enhanced capabilities for managing and analyzing scientific datasets.

tools.name: pyClowder
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for Clowder extractors
tools.detailed_description: A Python library to assist in the development of extractors for the Clowder data management system. It facilitates the creation of automated analysis scripts that process data uploaded to Clowder.

tools.name: Juneberry
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for automating ML training and evaluation
tools.detailed_description: Juneberry improves machine learning experimentation by providing a framework for automating the training, evaluation, and comparison of multiple models against multiple datasets. It focuses on reducing errors and improving reproducibility in ML research.

tools.name: RO-Crate Validator
tools.one_line_profile: Python package to validate Research Object Crates (RO-Crate) metadata
tools.detailed_description: A tool to verify that Research Object Crates (RO-Crates) comply with the official specifications, ensuring data reproducibility and compliance in scientific workflows.

tools.name: DataTracer
tools.one_line_profile: Library for tracking data lineage and provenance in datasets
tools.detailed_description: A library developed by the Data to AI Lab to trace the lineage of data, helping to understand the origin and transformation history of datasets in scientific and data science contexts.

tools.name: Determined
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning training platform with built-in experiment tracking
tools.detailed_description: An open-source platform for deep learning training that provides integrated experiment tracking, hyperparameter tuning, and resource management, facilitating reproducible AI research.

tools.name: RaceID3_StemID2_package
tools.one_line_profile: Algorithm for cell type and lineage inference from scRNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: An R package implementing RaceID3 and StemID2 algorithms for the identification of cell types and the inference of lineage trees from single-cell RNA sequencing data.

tools.name: StemID
tools.one_line_profile: Algorithm for lineage tree inference from single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: An algorithm designed to infer lineage trees and cell types from single-cell RNA-seq data, aiding in the understanding of cellular differentiation trajectories.

tools.name: PromptSite
tools.one_line_profile: Version control and tracking system for LLM prompts
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight package for versioning, tracking, experimenting, and debugging Large Language Model (LLM) prompts, supporting reproducible AI engineering and research.

tools.name: paleotree
tools.one_line_profile: R library for analyzing and simulating fossil phylogenies
tools.detailed_description: An R package for analyzing, time-scaling, and simulating phylogenies of extinct/fossil lineages, as well as plotting diversity curves for stratigraphic range data.

tools.name: MLTraq
tools.one_line_profile: Experiment tracking tool for machine learning projects
tools.detailed_description: A library to track and collaborate on Machine Learning & AI experiments, ensuring reproducibility and history management of model training runs.

tools.name: repurpose
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for reproducible drug repurposing prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based framework for building drug-disease association classifiers to support reproducible research in drug repurposing.

tools.name: aiida-defects
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for point defect calculations in materials
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow platform that provides automated workflows for calculating point defects in materials, ensuring provenance and reproducibility of simulations.

tools.name: PyGaze
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for programming eye tracking experiments
tools.detailed_description: An open-source toolbox for creating eye-tracking experiments in Python, supporting various eye trackers and providing a high-level interface for experimental control.

tools.name: IEEE-118 Power Flow Data Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline to generate IEEE-118 power system flow cases
tools.detailed_description: A data pipeline tool designed to build and simulate power flow cases for the IEEE-118 bus power system, useful for generating training data for power system studies.

tools.name: maggot
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight library for tracking numerical experiments
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to help researchers keep track of numerical experiments, managing configurations and results to support reproducibility.

tools.name: aiida-orca
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the ORCA quantum chemistry package
tools.detailed_description: A plugin connecting the ORCA quantum chemistry software with the AiiDA workflow engine, enabling automated and reproducible chemical calculations.

tools.name: transfer-nlp
tools.one_line_profile: Library for reproducible NLP experimentation
tools.detailed_description: A library designed to manage Natural Language Processing (NLP) experiments, promoting reproducibility and ease of transfer learning in AI research.

tools.name: Flyte DataCatalog
tools.one_line_profile: Service for indexing and versioning data artifacts in Flyte
tools.detailed_description: A service component of the Flyte platform that indexes parameterized, strongly-typed data artifacts, enabling memoization and data provenance tracking in scientific workflows.

tools.name: ForML
tools.one_line_profile: MLOps framework for data science project lifecycle management
tools.detailed_description: A development framework and MLOps platform designed to manage the lifecycle of data science projects, from development to deployment, ensuring consistency and reproducibility.

tools.name: trackio
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight local-first experiment tracking library
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight, local-first experiment tracking library from Hugging Face, designed to simplify the tracking of machine learning experiments without complex infrastructure.

tools.name: Ground
tools.one_line_profile: Vendor-neutral data context service for lineage and versioning
tools.detailed_description: An open-source data context service that manages data lineage, versioning, and metadata, aiming to provide a common substrate for data science and scientific reproducibility.

tools.name: Guild AI
tools.one_line_profile: Experiment tracking and automation tool for machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A tool for tracking machine learning experiments, automating workflows, and comparing results without requiring database setup. It captures source code, configuration, and results to ensure reproducibility.

tools.name: teemi
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for reproducible microbial strain construction and DBTL cycle simulation
tools.detailed_description: A platform for automating the Design-Build-Test-Learn (DBTL) cycle in metabolic engineering. It supports generating genetic parts, designing libraries, tracking samples, and ensuring FAIR data practices.

tools.name: ro-crate-rs
tools.one_line_profile: Rust library for handling Research Object Crates (RO-Crate)
tools.detailed_description: A Rust implementation for creating and manipulating RO-Crates, a community standard for packaging research data with structured metadata to ensure reproducibility and provenance tracking.

tools.name: Intel Experiments API
tools.one_line_profile: Experiment tracking API for machine learning on Kubernetes
tools.detailed_description: A Python API designed to track machine learning experiments, parameters, and metrics, specifically optimized for execution within Kubernetes environments.

tools.name: compchem_toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for computational chemistry workflows with AiiDA and VASP
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python functions designed to streamline input setup and output analysis for computational chemistry simulations using AiiDA, Pymatgen, and VASP.

tools.name: aiidalab-ispg
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA Lab application for ab initio UV/vis spectroscopy
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA Lab application (ATMOSPEC) that automates the workflow for calculating UV/vis spectroscopy properties using ab initio methods.

tools.name: jeelizPupillometry
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time web-based pupillometry library
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript/WebGL library for real-time pupil size measurement (pupillometry) using a webcam, enabling physiological data collection for cognitive science and psychology experiments in the browser.

tools.name: Kedro-Viz
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for Kedro data pipelines and experiment tracking
tools.detailed_description: An interactive visualization tool for Kedro pipelines that allows data scientists to inspect data lineage, track experiment metrics, and visualize the structure of machine learning workflows.

tools.name: Clowder Server
tools.one_line_profile: Research data management and curation platform
tools.detailed_description: The server-side implementation of Clowder, a web-based data management system designed to support research communities in curating, analyzing, and preserving long-tail data with metadata extraction capabilities.

tools.name: NovaCrate
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based editor for Research Object Crates (RO-Crate)
tools.detailed_description: An interactive web editor for creating, editing, visualizing, and validating RO-Crates, facilitating the packaging of research data with rich metadata for FAIR compliance.

tools.name: Kurator-Akka
tools.one_line_profile: Provenance-enabled workflow platform for biodiversity data curation
tools.detailed_description: A workflow platform based on the Akka actor model designed for curating biodiversity data, with built-in support for tracking data provenance throughout the curation process.

tools.name: LaminDB
tools.one_line_profile: Data framework for biology with lineage and FAIR principles
tools.detailed_description: A data framework specifically for biology that integrates data management, lineage tracking, and ontology management. It acts as a lakehouse and feature store, ensuring data is traceable and reproducible.

tools.name: aiida-lsmo
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA workflows for materials science (LSMO lab)
tools.detailed_description: A collection of AiiDA workflows and calculation plugins developed for the LSMO laboratory, facilitating automated materials science simulations and provenance tracking.

tools.name: aiida-raspa
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for RASPA molecular simulation software
tools.detailed_description: A plugin connecting the RASPA molecular simulation code with the AiiDA workflow engine, enabling automated adsorption and diffusion simulations with full data provenance.

tools.name: aiida-zeopp
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Zeo++ porous materials analysis
tools.detailed_description: A plugin integrating Zeo++ (a code for analyzing void space in porous materials) into the AiiDA framework, allowing for automated geometric analysis and provenance tracking.

tools.name: ProvToolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Java toolkit for W3C PROV data model
tools.detailed_description: A Java library for creating, manipulating, and converting provenance data compliant with the W3C PROV standard. It supports various serializations and enables provenance generation in scientific applications.

tools.name: AiiDA Explorer
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive provenance browser for AiiDA materials science databases
tools.detailed_description: A web-based visualization tool that allows users to explore and traverse the provenance graphs of materials science calculations stored in AiiDA databases, facilitating reproducibility and auditability.

tools.name: SingleCellLineage
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for processing GESTALT single-cell lineage data
tools.detailed_description: Scripts and pipelines designed to process GESTALT (genome editing of synthetic target arrays for lineage tracing) data at single-cell resolution, enabling reconstruction of cell lineage trees.

tools.name: aiida-autocas
tools.one_line_profile: Automated active space selection for multireference calculations in AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA plugin that automates the selection of active spaces for multireference quantum chemistry calculations, streamlining complex electronic structure workflows.

tools.name: aiida-dynamic-workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic workflow definition plugin for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA plugin enabling the definition of dynamic workflows using Python functions, enhancing the flexibility of materials science automation pipelines.

tools.name: aiida-pyscf
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for PySCF quantum chemistry framework
tools.detailed_description: Integrates the PySCF (Python-based Simulations of Chemistry Framework) into the AiiDA ecosystem, allowing PySCF calculations to be run as part of reproducible and provenance-tracked workflows.

tools.name: RSoptSC
tools.one_line_profile: Cell-cell communication and lineage inference from scRNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: An R package for inferring cell-cell communication networks and reconstructing cell lineage trajectories from single-cell RNA sequencing data.

tools.name: CellTagR
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis toolkit for CellTag lineage reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: An R package supporting the analysis of CellTagging data for clonal tracking, clone calling, and lineage reconstruction in single-cell experiments.

tools.name: aiida-gaussian
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Gaussian quantum chemistry software
tools.detailed_description: Connects the Gaussian quantum chemistry software package with AiiDA, enabling automated and reproducible electronic structure calculations.

tools.name: aiidalab-empa-surfaces
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDAlab application for on-surface chemistry simulations
tools.detailed_description: An application designed for the AiiDAlab platform to facilitate the simulation and analysis of on-surface chemistry experiments and materials properties.

tools.name: nf-prov
tools.one_line_profile: Provenance reporting plugin for Nextflow pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow plugin that generates comprehensive provenance reports for pipeline executions, supporting standards like BioCompute Objects and RO-Crate for reproducibility.

tools.name: ARCtrl
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Annotated Research Contexts (ARC) management
tools.detailed_description: A polyglot library for creating, manipulating, and validating Annotated Research Contexts (ARCs), a standard for packaging research data and metadata, particularly in plant sciences.

tools.name: ProkEvo
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for bacterial population genomics analyses
tools.detailed_description: An automated, reproducible, and scalable workflow framework designed for high-throughput bacterial population genomics and evolutionary analysis.

tools.name: ya2ro
tools.one_line_profile: Generator for Research Object Crates from YAML
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that automates the creation of Research Object Crates (RO-Crate) from simple YAML configurations, facilitating the packaging and sharing of research data and metadata.

tools.name: Widget Bandsplot
tools.one_line_profile: Jupyter widget for plotting electronic band structure and density of states
tools.detailed_description: A specialized visualization tool for materials science that renders interactive plots for electronic band structures and density of states (DOS) within Jupyter notebooks. Developed by OSSCAR (Open Software Services for Classrooms and Research).

tools.name: STREAM
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell Trajectories Reconstruction, Exploration And Mapping
tools.detailed_description: An interactive pipeline capable of disentangling and visualizing complex branching trajectories from both single-cell transcriptomic and epigenomic data.

tools.name: Provena
tools.one_line_profile: Provenance system for modelling and simulation workflows
tools.detailed_description: A system designed to manage and track provenance information specifically for scientific modelling and simulation workflows, ensuring reproducibility and auditability of scientific processes.

tools.name: Python Workflow Definition
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow interoperability standard for materials science engines
tools.detailed_description: A library defining a common workflow format to enable interoperability between major materials science workflow engines like AiiDA, Jobflow, and Pyiron.

tools.name: psychopy_ext
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for reproducible behavioral neuroscience experiments
tools.detailed_description: An extension for PsychoPy that facilitates rapid, reproducible design, analysis, and plotting of experiments in behavioral neuroscience and psychology.

tools.name: Phylociraptor
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid and reproducible phylogenomic tree calculator
tools.detailed_description: A highly customizable framework for reproducible phylogenomic inference, automating the calculation of phylogenomic trees from genomic data.

tools.name: DVCP-TE
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation model of the Tennessee Eastman chemical process
tools.detailed_description: A simulation implementation of the Tennessee Eastman chemical process, primarily designed as a testbed for cyber-physical system security research but serving as a scientific process model.

tools.name: showyourwork
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for reproducible and open scientific articles
tools.detailed_description: A workflow tool that automates the compilation of scientific papers, ensuring that all results and plots are programmatically reproducible from the source code and data.

tools.name: AiiDA-Siesta Plugin
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the Siesta DFT code to enable automated materials workflows
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow manager that interfaces with the Siesta density functional theory code, allowing for reproducible and automated electronic structure calculations and provenance tracking.

tools.name: EyeLoop
tools.one_line_profile: Python-based eye-tracking system for dynamic closed-loop experiments
tools.detailed_description: A flexible eye-tracking framework tailored for behavioral experiments, allowing for dynamic, closed-loop interactions on consumer-grade hardware.

tools.name: Seamless
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for reproducible and interactive computations in scientific workflows
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed to set up reproducible computations and visualizations that respond to changes in data or code cells, ensuring provenance and interactivity in scientific data analysis.

tools.name: HELM
tools.one_line_profile: Holistic Evaluation of Language Models framework
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive framework for the holistic, reproducible, and transparent evaluation of foundation models (LLMs), critical for assessing AI models used in scientific research.

tools.name: aiida-mlip
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA plugin that interfaces with machine learning interatomic potentials (MLIP), enabling automated and reproducible molecular dynamics simulations using ML potentials.

tools.name: LineageExplorer
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for estimating growth rate advantage of SARS-CoV2 variants
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to analyze international genomic surveillance data to estimate the growth rate advantage of SARS-CoV2 variants of concern using multinomial spline fits.

tools.name: DVC
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source version control system for machine learning projects
tools.detailed_description: Data Version Control (DVC) is a tool for data science and machine learning projects that enables data versioning, experiment tracking, and reproducibility, integrating with Git.

tools.name: DVCLive
tools.one_line_profile: Library for logging ML metrics and tracking experiments with DVC
tools.detailed_description: A Python library to log machine learning metrics, parameters, and model artifacts, designed to work seamlessly with DVC for experiment tracking and visualization.

tools.name: TruLens
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation and tracking framework for LLM experiments
tools.detailed_description: A tool for evaluating and tracking Large Language Model (LLM) based applications, providing feedback functions and observability for AI experiments.

tools.name: PROV Python
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for the W3C Provenance Data Model (PROV)
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the W3C PROV data model, allowing for the generation, serialization, and export of provenance information in scientific workflows.

tools.name: CoRR
tools.one_line_profile: Cloud of Reproducible Records platform by NIST
tools.detailed_description: A platform developed by NIST to support the management and sharing of reproducible records for scientific computations and simulations.

tools.name: OpenCorr
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Digital Image and Volume Correlation
tools.detailed_description: An open-source C++ library for Digital Image Correlation (DIC) and Digital Volume Correlation (DVC), used for strain and deformation measurement in materials science.

tools.name: Deepkit ML
tools.one_line_profile: Collaborative machine learning development and experiment tracking suite
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive development tool and training suite for machine learning that includes experiment execution, tracking, debugging, and project management features.

tools.name: galaxy2cwl
tools.one_line_profile: Converter to export Galaxy workflows to Common Workflow Language (CWL) format
tools.detailed_description: A standalone tool designed to facilitate the interoperability and reproducibility of scientific workflows by converting Galaxy workflow descriptions and execution logs into the standard Common Workflow Language (CWL) format. This supports the auditing and portability of bioinformatics and computational science pipelines.

tools.name: aiida-yambo
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the Yambo many-body perturbation theory code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow manager that interfaces with the Yambo code. It automates Many-Body Perturbation Theory (MBPT) calculations (such as GW and BSE) for materials science, ensuring full data provenance, reproducibility, and workflow management for excited-state simulations.

tools.name: aiida-castep
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the CASTEP DFT code
tools.detailed_description: An interface connecting the AiiDA workflow engine with the CASTEP software package. It enables the automation of Density Functional Theory (DFT) calculations, managing input generation, submission, and parsing of results while strictly preserving the provenance of the materials simulation data.

tools.name: ZnTrack
tools.one_line_profile: Parameter tracking and workflow management for scientific Python pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight interface built on top of DVC (Data Version Control) specifically tailored for scientific computing. It allows researchers to define, run, and track parameters/metrics of computational pipelines (e.g., molecular dynamics, ML potentials) directly from Python or Jupyter Notebooks, facilitating reproducibility and experiment tracking in materials science and chemistry.
